title: fps drop
body: Not only me but I see many other people having this issue too. After the new patch FPS dropping random and make the game very slow and lag. And it's been a month but riot still didn't fix it. Come on riot, I believe you guys have enough people to find and fix the problems. Also, stop blaming for players bad connection which is not.

replies.body:
Random fps drops aren't very likely to be caused by connection issues, but typically they can be traced back to some kind of bad software/hardware interaction with league. We can cover most of our bases by going through the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)).

Hit me back up if you have any questions along the way.
